==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|む|ろん}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=むろん}} {{m|zh|無論|tr=mju lwon<sup>H</sup>|lit=without discussion, no argument}}. Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} ''mò-lun'' or {{etyl|yue|-}} ''mou<sup>4</sup> leon<sup>6</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|むろん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Adverb===
{{ja-pos|adverb|むろん}}

# [[no doubt]], [[naturally]], [[of course]], [[it goes without saying]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''無論'''こんな馬鹿なことはありえない。|'''^むろん''' こんな ばか な こと は ありえない。|'''It goes without saying that''' this kind of idiotic thing simply cannot be.}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むろん}}

# something that is clearly the case
#: {{ja-usex|あれは'''無論'''ですね。|^あれ は '''むろん''' です ね。|That is '''clearly the case'''.}}

====Usage notes====
More commonly used as an [[adverb]].
